tool_description: This filter detects offensive English swear words based on if they SOUND like bad words on your list. This filter matches by phonetic patterns and can block bad words that have been purposefully misspelled. This is useful when you need to be sure a message in non offensive, such as TTS applications.
name: Phonetic Bad Word Filter
title: Phonetic Bad Word Filter

api_list.name: Phonetic Filter Check
api_list.description: Check input phrase for bad words
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://phonetic-bad-word-filter.p.rapidapi.com/PhoneticCheck"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phonetic-bad-word-filter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://phonetic-bad-word-filter.p.rapidapi.com/PhoneticCheck"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phonetic-bad-word-filter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
